Feel free to reach out to the ApeCoin Team at any point with your questions!


ğŸ‘€ **ABOUT** 
**ApeCoin** is an ERC-20 governance and utility token for decentralized communities building at the forefront of culture and web3. Yuga Labs, the company behind the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem, is a contributor to the APE ecosystem and is adopting ApeCoin as the primary token for the BAYC ecosystem as well as upcoming metaverse and gaming experiences. APE adoption will be driven largely by communities who are driving culture forward through NFTs, art, gaming, entertainment, community and events.

Hello and welcome to the <#1031686703246737471> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314>

Feel free to reach out to the ApeCoin Team at any point with your questions!

ğŸ‘€ **ABOUT**
We encourage all developers to come build on ApeCoin. Whether youâ€™re interested in governance improvements, security infrastructure, or a better way to drop custom merch, ApeCoin wants to make sure you have the resources to build it!

We are open to all ideas, but if youâ€™re looking for some inspiration here are some areas our community has been interested in: Governance - DAO tooling, dashboards, analytics, etc Community - expanding ApeCoin reach to more NFT communities Security - tooling or resources for NFT holders, especially tooling around account abstraction


ğŸ† **PRIZE OVERVIEW**

**Best Integration Prizes go to the projects that can show the most innovative use of ApeCoin in a dApp.**
ğŸ¥‡ First Place - $2,000
ğŸ¥ˆ Second Place - $1,000
ğŸ¥‰ Third Place - $500

**Best Contribution Prizes go to the projects that help the ApeCoin community the most.** 
ğŸ¥‡ First Place - $3,500
ğŸ¥ˆ Second Place - $2,000
ğŸ¥‰ Third Place - $1,000

Hi, I am working on to improve the governance of apecoin community , would love to connect with apecoin team to know more on how we can improve.

thank you for the questions!! working group zero is similar to the working groups for ENS. Participation in the DAO is open to anyone (no apecoin needed), and the working groups support with more operational and community building efforts.
here's a better discord link: https://discord.gg/wg0

Some resources to check out: 

- Website: http://apecoin.com 
*good for details on the DAO structure*

- Delegate Site: https://delegate.apecoin.com/
*for delegating governance voting*

- Twitter: http://twitter.com/apecoin 
*good for real-time info*

- Forum: http://forum.apecoin.com 
*best place to see proposals and discussion in progress*
*Anyone can view the forum, but 1 ApeCoin is required to participate in the conversation *

- Discord: https://discord.gg/wg0
*where the DAO working group meets and DAO discourse happens*
*i recommend looking at the 'start-here and 'faq' channels to begin*

- ApeCoin Smart Contract: https://etherscan.io/address/0x4d224452801aced8b2f0aebe155379bb5d594381
Still cannot get past Vulcan verification, only rules and verify channels are available

right now it requires 1 APE to join, but i'm working on a solution. Will post something as soon as that is figured out.

Voting happens on Snapshot. https://snapshot.org/#/apecoin.eth  
You can query active proposals via Snapshot API: https://docs.snapshot.org/guides/graphql-api

Hey <@570693318133022768> Thank you for the links but they are unfruitful for the time being.
Maybe create a #developer channel where you can give access to those with test ape tokens ?
you can use this link for test ape tokens: https://goerli.etherscan.io/address/0x328507DC29C95c170B56a1b3A758eB7a9E73455c

To mint test APE you can do the following steps from that address: 

Select the contract tab on etherscan
Connect your wallet 
Select the Write Contract tab
Use the mint function which has the following parameters: 
      - Address: 
      - Amount: Enter the amount of ApeCoin you would like. Important to note that the contract does not use decimal numbers so one ApeCoin isa ctually in the form of Wei (1000000000000000000000). Use the following converter for easily copy and pasting the values you want https://eth-converter.com. 
Click/tap the Write button and you will be presented with the transaction URL on Etherscan. You must have some Goerli ETH to use for gas fees (https://goerlifaucet.com)(

Some folks have done things like Ape Wine and Ape Water where the holder can have their NFT branded onto the packaging. Thereâ€™s also someone who does awesome custom pins of individual NFTs. gm contributors ! Iâ€™m Lost, one of the judges here and an elected Steward in the ApeCoin DAO. 

I submitted my choices last night and I want to say that I was incredibly impressed by the caliber of hacks we received.

This has been eye opening for me as a comparison to the current state of our DAO, including incoming proposals, and Iâ€™d like to welcome everyone to continue contributing to the apecoin dao. Our DAO is still young, learning, growing, and thereâ€™s unlimited potential to come and create an impact together.

I hope you all had a chance to join us in the Discord and Discourse already, if not itâ€™s pinned here. Looking forward to seeing the results posted.

Also, Iâ€™d like to invite you all to consider submitting a grant request proposal to the apecoin dao directly on Discourse(pinned) if youâ€™re working on something you feel has the potential to really make an impact.

Hi Lost, thanks for your wonderful feedback, its greatly appreciated. I'm sure the rest will agree, we all eagerly awaiting tomorrow's results. I slid into discord but must checkout discourse still, I would definitely like to find out more and have a few questions, but will save them for another day I think. Thanks again to Maaria for all your help, a star you are. Regards Craig Moss
Good luck frens, only one more day to go
Happy to answer questions here for the benefit of anyone who maybe looking in, or if you prefer to dm thatâ€™s okay too. Youâ€™ll have to send a  friend request though so I can accept a dmğŸ§¡

I'm gonna try link with NF3 Exchange and would love to chat to them and see how we can work together perhaps and utilize the foundation they provided. Lastly thing is there a few awesome project here, so again seeing how we can work together and help grow our projects in the Apecoin system collectively,

I just want to congratulate all the hackers and sponsor staff for their work and add that as a builder I have no problem to contribute and collaborate to improve the ecosystem, either through my project, or with new ideas, we all know that this world is changing every second. Thanks again and congrats ğŸ’œ

A gargantuan thank you to Maaria and Lost, I don't think you realize what a positive change you have made in my families life today, for that I'm truly grateful, thank you â™¥ï¸
